name: Okay I Pull Up
description:
First game I've actually completed, made in 1 day.

Okay I Pull Up is an endless runner game, where you collect watermelons and dash your way to a higher score. I made this game to prove to myself that I can actually finish a project, and gave myself one day to do as such. The result was this project. It includes a high score system (as long as you keep the game open), among other various things. I likely won't be updating this, but there's a chance. Also, you might want to mute the game. I don't know how loud it is.
